text: Yury Konstantinovich Zaitsev (; 17 January 1951 â€“ 30 September 2022) was a Soviet weightlifter and Olympic champion who competed for Soviet Union. He won a gold medal at the 1976 Summer Olympics in Montreal. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Russian sportspeople Category:Soviet weightlifters Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Medalists at the 1976 Summer Olympics
